artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Trifold sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,280); man at left in orange breeches, pink and white vest trimmed in fur, a black coat and a black hat; woman in the center in a white and green gown with an orange overgown and a blue and orange hat with orange bows and blue plumes; on the right a cherub sits on a column with arms outstretched toward a large vase with handles with flames shooting from the top
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashioin plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Onzième Cahier, 29 Février 1788
